claims.claim: Developers can create 5G applications faster with AI-enhanced tools
claims.quote: Nokia and Google Cloud collaborate to help developers worldwide create 5G applications faster with telco APIs

claims.claim: AI capabilities improve developer productivity through coding assistance
claims.quote: This will enable developers to easily consume AI in their applications and improve productivity with coding assistance agents

claims.claim: Healthcare companies can provide better and safer customer experiences
claims.quote: beginning with healthcare industry to help telehealth companies provide better, safer customer experiences

claims.claim: Developers gain access to standardized 5G network capabilities globally
claims.quote: Google Cloud's expansive developer community, covering all major industries and geographies, will benefit by having access to standardized 5G network capabilities around the world

claims.claim: Platform enables developers to create value for customers faster
claims.quote: enabling thousands of Google Cloud developers to tap into our network capabilities so that they can create value for their customers faster

claims.claim: Platform accelerates software application development for new use cases
claims.quote: enables application developers and communication service providers (CSPs) to accelerate the work of producing software applications for new enterprise, industrial, and consumer use cases

claims.claim: CSPs can monetize 5G and 4G network assets beyond basic connectivity
claims.quote: monetizing 5G and 4G network assets beyond basic connectivity

claims.claim: Platform provides CSPs a viable pathway to utilize 5G assets for value creation
claims.quote: providing CSPs a viable new pathway to utilize their 5G assets for enterprise and consumer value creation

claims.claim: Developers can create enhanced applications and experiences for customers
claims.quote: this platform gives developers a meaningful way to create enhanced applications and experiences for their customers

claims.claim: Platform enables creation and monetization of solutions for new use cases
claims.quote: Developers and CSPs can leverage the combination of Nokia's Network as Code platform with the DISH 5G Open RAN cloud-based network to create and monetize solutions for new use cases across both consumer and enterprise markets
